references.paper_title: A linear non-gaussian acyclic model for causal discovery
references.reason: This paper introduces the Linear Non-Gaussian Acyclic Model (LiNGAM), a widely used method for causal discovery in linear systems.

references.paper_title: Challenging common assumptions in the unsupervised learning of disentangled representations

references.paper_title: Shortcut learning in deep neural networks
references.reason: This paper highlights the limitations of deep learning models which often rely on superficial correlations instead of genuine causal relationships, leading to poor generalization.
